Action.author: rameshthoomu
Action.body: Publishing docker images through docker registry using Nexus is possible but this requires Nexus version 3.0.. As per chat conversation with Ry Jones (Linux foundation), Nexus 3.0 version isn't in the schedule yet, it isn't released under the license we have yet. This is blocking to complete the above task. Have to check with @cbf on moving this forward.

Action.author: rameshthoomu
Action.body: We have now nexus3 server available for Hyperledger builds. I have submitted WIP patch https://gerrit.hyperledger.org/r/#/c/6767/ and tested this through Sandbox job.. Observed build failures with incorrect `groupID` and facing issues with docker push. Working with ~jwagantall

Action.author: rameshthoomu
Action.body: Patch has been provided and it is merged. Monitoring the Nexus build

Action.author: rameshthoomu
Action.body: Patch has been submitted to publish docker images to nexus repository. Images are being published to nexus repository.https://nexus3.hyperledger.org/#browse/browse/components:docker.snapshot
